text: HCA Healthcare is an American healthcare business started in 1968. It is based in Nashville, Tennessee. It runs 186 hospitals and about 2,000 other services. They are mostly in the US. It is the biggest private health business in the United Kingdom where it has 30 services. It is opening a big new private hospital in Birmingham in 2023. 56 of the hospitals in the USA are teaching hospitals. It does a lot of education for doctors and nurses in the US. == References == Category:Healthcare companies of the United States
title: HCA Healthcare
